body: At 8th level, when you make a Disable Device or Sleight of Hand check, you can roll twice and take the higher result. Using this ability is a free action. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 2 levels beyond 8th.
name: Thief of the Gods
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Cleric/Subdomains/Thievery Subdomain/Replacement Power/Thief of the Gods
